channel.title: Cant play
channel.description:
No private server seems to work for me, i have the 64bit Java, everything looks good, the variables are set, classpath too, but i still have this problem:
When i start the server, it loads and everything is ok, but when i login into the game, i only make a few clicks and the client suddenly closes. Any ideas what it is?

item.title: Cant play
item.dc:creator: @wattz wattz
item.description:
@wattz wrote:

Nah, the idea is, when i was using Windows Vista 64bit, i had the same problem, but someone taught me how to fix it, but now i changed my OS to Windows 7 and i have the same problem. The bad thing is the forum where i found the fix is no longer thereâ€¦

Read full topic

item.title: Cant play
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

It could just be that the servers you have played on were all shitty, unstable servers.

Read full topic
